mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, email, `password` , `name`, nickname, user_pic AS userPic , `role`, user_status AS userStatus FROM user WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET email = CONCAT('deletedEmail_', #{userId}) , `password` = 'deletedPassword' , `name` = '탈퇴회원' , nickname = CONCAT('deletedNickname_', #{userId}) , user_pic = NULL , user_status = 1 WHERE user_id = #{userId}
